entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
